text:
Asahi-chan, Asahi-chan,
The lion dance is coming this way~

......Whoa! That kid got bitten,
what happened?

It's considered lucky
to have your head bitten.

Yes, yes!
I want the lion to bite my head too~!
-- Suddenly having your head bitten is not pleasant.
What's it like inside the mouth?

Hey, Asahi-chan!
The lion dance is in trouble!
